item.title: Uneven roads causing noise/vibrations, 8th June
item.description:
Due to design of road, the purpose of 'speed reduction' is ineffective. Speeding buses, lorries, vans simply speed past without deterrence, causing much noise (due to friction from bricks) and lose bricks cause much vibrations to our block/flats - especially late at night. Perhaps a speed camera will be better instead? Please level the road. Vibrations are causing our shelves, cabinets, doors to vibrate in our houses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Akerman Road, Loughborough Junction, London
Report on FixMyStreet
